title: Sequential Chaining Pattern

segments.text: Sequential chaining breaks complex tasks into manageable steps - each building on the previous output for superior results.
Instead of one massive prompt, sequential chains create a pipeline where each AI call specializes in one specific task.
Implementation is straightforward - pass the output of each chain as input to the next, creating a data pipeline.
Compare this to traditional single prompts - sequential chaining gives you control, transparency, and higher quality.
Each chain can be optimized independently, debugged easily, and replaced without affecting the entire pipeline.
Sequential chaining transforms complex AI tasks into manageable, transparent, and highly reliable workflows.
